name: aberdeen
author: Frank van Viegen
description: Build fast reactive UIs in pure TypeScript/JavaScript without a virtual DOM.

scripts.build: bun run build:dist && bun run build:docs && bun run build:skill
scripts.build:dist: rm -rf dist dist-min && bun build src/*.ts --sourcemap --target browser --external '*/aberdeen.js' --outdir dist/ && bun build src/*.ts --minify --sourcemap --target browser --external '*/aberdeen.js' --outdir dist-min/ && npx tsc --emitDeclarationOnly && cd dist-min && ln -s ../dist/*.d.ts .
scripts.build:docs: typedoc && rm -rf dist-docs/assets/aberdeen && cp -r dist dist-docs/assets/aberdeen
scripts.build:skill: typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --out skill --tsconfig tsconfig.json --entryPoints src/*.ts --excludeInternal --excludePrivate --hideGenerator --readme none --router module && rm -rf skill/assets skill/documents skill/README.md && cat SKILL.md > skill/SKILL.md && awk '/^-+$/ { count++; next } count >= 2' docs/Tutorial.md >> skill/SKILL.md
